body.name: Bevel Safety Razor with Brass Weighted Handle and 10 Double Edge Safety Blade Refills, Single Blade Razor for Men, Designed for Coarse Hair to Prevent Razor Bumps - Silver (Packaging May Vary)

features: LUXURY SAFETY RAZOR - This razor is re-engineered to help prevent razor bumps and irritation using double edge razor blades and a generously weighted handle
PERFECT GIFT FOR MEN - The Bevel Safety Razor makes for the perfect mens gift for your father, husband, son, or friend, for any holiday
WORKS WITH COARSE HAIR - The single blade effortlessly cuts at skin level to prevent and reduce bumps, irritation, and ingrown hairs for coarse/curly hair
HIGH QUALITY - Perfectly weighted brass handle glides across skin without additional pressure
ECO FRIENDLY RAZOR - The environmentally friendly design is free of plastic, built to be reused, and can be safely recycled

RECOMMENDED: Use Pre-Shave Oil to create a lubricating layer that helps reduce nicks and cuts that can cause dark spots and patches. Create a rich, protective lather with Shave Brush & Shave Cream to exfoliate and lift hair for a closer, effortless shave giving you smoother, softer skin. Use Safety Razor & Blades to cut hair at skin level to help reduce bumps and irritation. Finish with alcohol-free Post-Shave Balm for instant soothing and calming upon application.v
body.description: Product Description Unlike multi-blade razors, The Bevel Razor was designed to shave at the surface of the skin helping you to prevent razor bumps. Use with a fresh Bevel Blade and the rest of the products in the Bevel Shave System for a consistently smooth shave and clearer skin. The Bevel Shave System consists of The Bevel Razor, Bevel Badger Brush, Bevel Shave Cream, Bevel Priming Oil, Bevel Restoring Balm and Bevel Blades. From the Manufacturer

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Bevel Difference Helps improve your skin’s ability to hold moisture to stay fresh and moisturized all day. Locks in moisture and restores hair strength without stripping hair of its natural oils. Helps reduce bumps, dark spots, and irritation for a fresher, healthier appearance. Moisturizes hair to help strengthen, nourish, and reduce breakage for a fuller beard.

Pre-Shave Oil Shave Cream Post-Shave Balm Safety Razor Shave Starter Kit Shave Kit Creates a lubricating layer to help reduce nicks and cuts ✓ ✓ ✓ Protect lather creates an ultra-moisturizing barrier to hydrate skin ✓ ✓ ✓ Helps instantly sooth and calm skin after shaves ✓ ✓ ✓ Exfoliates to remove dead skin ✓ Perfectly weighted to glide across skin ✓ The first end-to-end shave system for coarse and curly hair ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Dermatologist-tested, helps prevent razor bumps and irritation ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd bevel razor I've gotten for my husband and he absolutely loves them. They've helped soo much keep his head smooth and the bumps and ingrown hairs to a minimum. I just had to get this 2nd one after the first one fell and hit just right that it broke the handle off but it was already about 2 years old so we more than got our money's worth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice balance and weight
reviews.reviewText: Tired of paying for the multiblade options I decided to try this blade. It is well balanced. It has been awhile since using one of these so I was very careful. Take your time while shaving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Shave, possible durability issue
reviews.reviewText: This was the 1st razor I bought to try the switch to single edge blades after 25+ years of shaving with the big brand multi-bladed razors. After a week or two of getting used to it, I'd grown to really love this shave that this razor produces.I happily used this razor for 9 months, and then the threaded part of the handle stripped. I was kind of ticked off that something I spent $50 died after 9 months, but KEEP READING!Convinced that the switch to single edge was indeed where I wanted to stay, I bought a cheap $18 single edge razor handle. And THAT is when I really learned that this handle has something special about it. The cheaper razor handle just wasn't as smooth or comfortable as this Bevel brand had been. Had I purchased the cheap one outright, I probably would have switched back to multi razors. Fortunately, the handle of the cheap one fit the head of this Bevel model, and I really appreciated that this handle is something special!It's unfortunate that it stripped, BUT, I'm happily shaving with my centaur version of this razor. I guess I'd recommend it, but be careful not to overtighten it! It really produces a superior shave. Happy Shaving!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aggressive shave w/ very low risk of irritation
reviews.reviewText: So far, this is the best safety razor I've tried. The first thing I noticed was that it's a lot heavier than other razors. I thought this might throw me off when trying to use it, but that didn't turn out to be the case. Over several weeks of use, I've had no issues. The shave is more aggressive with less irritation and risk of cuts and nicks than other brands. Of course, I'm careful with the angle and the pressure.Sometimes, it feels like it's just gliding along my face doing nothing, but then when I feel where I just shaved, there's no hair. I've never had issues with razor bumps, but my skin is fairly sensitive, so I'm glad I opted for a Bevel this time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great clean Shave!
reviews.reviewText: Should go with out saying but safety razors have a learning curve and you skin will need to get use to the blade vs if you use multi blade razors. Be careful and take your time the first couple of shaves.The handle is of great quality and has a great weight to it that makes it a bit easier for me at least to control while shaving!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poorly made safety razor
reviews.reviewText: Shaves worse than disposable razors. Design makes no sense with it needing to be opened where the blade is as opposed to other razors that have the release by the handle. The handle being smooth metal with no grip is also a poor design choice since it will be prone to slipping while shaving. Highly recommend another brand like Weishi which is cheaper, better quality, and designed better. This was a huge waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice weight and smooth design. However, the smooth handle mixed with water and shaving cream is useless. Razor keeps slipping.I would not recommend this Razor for the amount. A nice Merkur is much more effective and thought through.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply the best safety razor I’ve tried
reviews.reviewText: Switched to standard, single blade safety razors this year. I’ve tried several including the Manscape plow and more expensive units. This is the most confidence inspiring to use. Even tried it with lower cost Japanese blades and it’s smoother than a King Gillette when running those. It’s the best value in razors I’ve found to date and a joy to use with great first pass results. Some talk about it not shaving as close. Perhaps that’s true, but I’ve not noticed a huge difference. And if so, the comfort and ease is worth it.

Um ótimo safity razor, com bom nível de agrecividade e eficiência. Não é pra quem vai iniciar no barbear tradicional. Pra quem ta vindo do barbear nutella é melhor um safity razor mais suave, até a pele ficar com menos imperfeições e ai sim evoluir pra ele.
I was impressed with the ease of using it and how good it shaved.
Excelente servicio, el producto llegó antes del tiempo estimado y en buenas condiciones, muy satisfecho.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best shave in a long time
reviews.reviewText: I started to develop some post-inflammatory pigmentation along my moustache line, with the use of other common shavers, and so someone recommended Bevel to me. I definitely get a very close shave with this product. After a few weeks of use, there seems to be some decreased ingrown hair formation. I really like the weight of the unit, which makes the whole process easy as you do not have to apply much external pressure. It also has a very cool design, and replacement blades are very affordable. Would definitely recommend.
Mild to medium, well balanced and finished. Feels good in hand.
